author: Staff Reporter
text:
Around 50 residents of Keezh Agraharam near Villianur on Thursday staged a protest in front of the Collectorate here demanding that the government grant them pattas for the land on which they have been living for the last 20 years.

According to sources, the residents sought patta for a private land and opposed the move of the government to relocate them to an alternative site at Kanuvapet.

They alleged that the alternative site was close to a burial ground and wanted the government to abandon the move. The residents later withdrew the protest following discussions with officials.
title: Residents protest move to relocate, seek patta
